content: >http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2009/may/24/south-korea-former-president-suicide Former South Korean President Roh is reported to have killed himself by leaping off a mountain. His suicide is attributable by a note left for his family. Roh had been under investigation for graft by his family members had concluded his term as president in February. Roh was a proponent of Korean reintegration. He had been accused of sedition and arrested under a previous military administration in the ROK.
reply: >http://www.guardian.co.uk/world/2009/may/24/south-korea-former-president-suicide Former South Korean President Roh is reported to have killed himself by leaping off a mountain. His suicide is attributable by a note left for his family. Roh had been under investigation for graft by his family members had concluded his term as president in February. Roh was a proponent of Korean reintegration. He had been accused of sedition and arrested under a previous military administration in the ROK.
title: Ex SK President Suicide
